title: Prabakaran kept India out of Sri Lanka – why are we not doing the same?
content: – by Shenali Waduge – India admits that initial training for Tamil militant groups including LTTE was given by India and that training continued from post 1983 to 1987 which is why the Indian Government took pains to remove details of India’s training from the Jain Commission report. Be that as it may, Prabakaran…
